Gatekeeper Mellos:

Do you know how to use the map?

You can use it to learn more about your current location and the place you're going to. You can also see recommendations there.

One more thing! We, the Gatekeepers, always ask adventurers about the places they've been to in order to create the recommendations. So you can trust us.

So, are you ready to travel somewhere to try your new knowledge out?
